detaileddescription.para: Implements various utility functions, system registration functions, and component registration for the game's entity component system (ECS).

listitem.para: registerServerSystem(Registry &registry, sf::RenderWindow &window, AssetManager &textureManager, float &elapsed_time) Registers server systems to the registry, with the necessary dependencies injected.

registerClientSystem(Registry &registry, sf::RenderWindow &window, AssetManager &textureManager, float &elapsed_time) Registers client systems to the registry, with the necessary dependencies injected.
cleanup_system(Registry &registry) Cleans up entities that have moved out of the screen bounds, or meet other conditions for cleanup.
register_all_components(Registry &registry) Registers all the components used in the game to the registry.
colliderTypeMap, entityTypeMap, deathApplyTypeMap These maps map string names to enum values for different types.
Various headers for the ECS framework, systems, and components.
SFML for rendering and other game-related functionalities.
Each system registration function and cleanup function could be part of a larger game initialization and management module or class.

memberdef.name: entityTypeMap
